map.loginRequiredDesc: Please sign in to view full village details.

limited.title: Limited Public View
limited.description: This public view shows a restricted subset of data and map features. Sign in with an approved role to access full analytics, editing and sensitive datasets.

canSee.title: What you can see
canSee.basic: Basic village markers with anonymized stats

restricted.title: What is restricted
restricted.details: Detailed claim records and personally identifiable data

needAccess.title: Need full access?
needAccess.desc: Sign in with a verified role to view complete datasets and tools.

hero.description: A comprehensive platform for tracking, visualizing, and managing Forest Rights Act claims across India. Secure, interactive, and designed for government officials and community leaders.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Forest Rights Management?
cta.subtitle: Join government officials and community leaders who are already using FRA Portal to streamline forest rights administration across India.

features.title: Powerful Features for Forest Rights Management
features.subtitle: Everything you need to efficiently manage and track forest rights claims across India

mapping.title: Interactive Mapping
mapping.desc: Real-time visualization of forest rights claims across Indian states with detailed geographic data.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.desc: Comprehensive data visualization with charts, trends, and statistical insights.

security.title: Secure Authentication
security.desc: Firebase-powered security with protected routes and user session management.

users.title: User Management
users.desc: Complete user registration, login, and profile management system.

states.title: State Highlighting
states.desc: Special focus on key states: MP, Odisha, Telangana, and Tripura.

mobile.title: Mobile Responsive
mobile.desc: Seamless experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

tech.title: Built with Modern Technology
tech.subtitle: Leveraging cutting-edge tools for optimal performance and security

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.subtitle: Your data is protected with industry-leading security measures and compliance standards.

card.title: Secure by Design
card.desc: Built with security-first principles to protect sensitive forest rights data and user information.

footer.tagline: Empowering forest communities through digital innovation and comprehensive forest rights management solutions.
footer.rights: All rights reserved. Built for Forest Rights Administration.

ai.dashboardSubtitle: Intelligent analysis and recommendations for forest rights management
ai.limitedDescription: Detailed description hidden for your role. Contact administrator for full analytics access.
ai.limitedDetail: Limited detail view. Upgrade permissions to view full insight.
